result.execSummary:
The defendant Raeana Mae NAGY was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Conspiracy to Commit Robbery with Threat of Force [Modifiers: Conspiracy to Commit], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(1)(b).
  • Furnishing a Firearm to an Unauthorized Person, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(4).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Manitowoc County Clerk of Circuit Court

superMiscConds.notes: Pay restitution of $2,500.00 to KK Unimart; $254.00 to Delores Kuik and $662.78 to Shoreline Credit Union.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Submit DNA sample.  

Not to be on or near the premise of KK Mobile Gas Station in Mishicot, WI  54228.

Defendant's prison wages may be garnished during her prison time to pay restitution.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
The State files an Amended Information which amends the charge in count 1 to conspiracy to commit robbery with threat of force, contrary to Section 943.32(1)(b) of the Wisconsin Statutes.  
NO CONTEST plea entered to the amended charge in count 1, conspiracy to commit robbery with threat of force.  Convicted.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the charge in count 2, furnish firearm to unauthorized person.  Convicted.
The State moves to dismiss and read in counts three through six.  Motion granted.
The Court orders a Presentence Investigation Report be completed by DOC.
PSI is due on 07-11-16.
Sentencing is set for 07-18-16 at 9:00 a.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
No agreement.
Pretrial conference is set for 04-22-16 at 9:00 a.m.
Jury trial is set for 05-03-16 and 05-04-16 at 8:30 a.m. no: 1 position.
Minutes.

Order Modifying Bond.
It is hereby ordered that the cash bond amount shall be reduced from $25,000 to $10,000.  
Copy to sheriff.
Cover letter.

MOTION TO MODIFY BOND - 
Defendant in custody.
The parties argue the motion.
The Court comments and agrees that cash bail is necessary, but will lower it to $10,000.00 cash.  All conditions will remain in place.
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish bail executed.  Copy to jail.
Minutes.
Letter from Attorney Sczygelski confirming 01-15-16 hearing date.
Motion hearing is set for 01-15-16 at 9:45 a.m.

Motion to Modify Bond.
Cover letter.

Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.
Ralph Sczygelski, through public defender.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.   
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with DA set for 11-06-2015 at 3:45 p.m.  Plea date is set for 02-17-2016 at 2:00 p.m.  
Minutes.
Ralph Sczygelski, through public defender.
Affidavit of Detective Dennis Jacobs, Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department.
Search warrant issued.  RE:  HTC Model phone.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 09-30-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
RE:  Unimart in Mishicot, WI, on 09-07-15.

records.descr: Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of PTC possess firearm as a felon, conspiracy to commit armed robbery, identity theft, forgery, obstruct officer and encourage probation violation.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 09-21-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $25,000.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, provide a DNA sample, have no contact with the Unimart in Mishicot, WI, do not possess any firearms and defendant is not to travel outside Manitowoc County without permission of the court.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.  
Minutes.
